meanings.definition: The act of arranging documents in a systematic order for easy reference.
meanings.sent1: I did the filing of my school papers to keep them neat.
meanings.sent2: The office manager handles all the filing of important documents.
meanings.sent3: The filing of the papers was so precise, it looked like a work of art.
meanings.sent4: Her filing of the papers was like a well-orchestrated symphony.
meanings.sent5: The filing of the documents made finding them a breeze.

meanings.definition: A folder or box used for storing papers in an organized manner.
meanings.sent1: She placed the important papers in the filing on the shelf.
meanings.sent2: The filing on the desk kept all the documents in order.
meanings.sent3: The filing on the table seemed to be chatting with the stapler.
meanings.sent4: The filing in the cabinet stood like a guardian of information.
meanings.sent5: The filing in the drawer was a treasure trove of records.
